title: Invalid format please help:'(
body:
Hi I'm using a 22" tv using 1280x1024 resolution this usually work for league but then all of a sudden I get invalid format when ever I load game. The game loads, I can hear in game music and everything but can't see the screen.

Thanks:)

replies.body:
Some players are still experiencing issues in Full Screen mode with certain resolutions or system configurations. We're still looking into a solid fix for this, but some players have had luck by hitting **ALT+ENTER** once they enter the loading screen. This will toggle your video mode to a Windowed or Borderless mode, which you'll need to use until a permanent fix has rolled out for this.

Let me know if this helped!
